Space Game Task.Description: The Space Game is a 2-Stage Reinforcement Learning/Reward-Related Decision Making Task
Space Game Task.DatasetType: derivative - trial level data prepared for use in decision-making modeling produced by code/SpaceGame_WF.py

block.Description: Block number for the task - the number does not correspond to conditions so should always follow sequence 1, 2, 3, 4

timeout_earth.Description: Indicates if participant timedout before responding during stage 1 - selecting a rocket

timeout_planet.Description: Indicates if participant timedout before responding during stage 2 - pressing SPACE bar to get treasure from alien

state_earth.Description: Indicates the state the earth is in for each trial (specific pairings of rockets)

state_planet.Description: Indicates the state the planet is in for each trial (reward state - high or low)

stim_left.Description: Indicates which rocket was presented during stage 1 (earth) on the left side of screen

stim_right.Description: Indicates which rocket was presented during stage 1 (earth) on the right side of screen

rt_earth.Description: Reaction time of response during stage 1 - rocket choice. Note: a value of -1 indicates the response window was missed

rt_planet.Description: Reaction time of response during stage 2 - asking alien for treasure. Note: a value of -1 indicates the response window was missed

choice_earth.Description: choice made during stage 1 - rocket choice

response.Description: participant response during stage 1 - rocket choice

win.Description: idicates if points were wond on that trial

stake.Description: the stake for the trial - no relevant for this task as all stakes were removed

score.Description: running tally of points/total score after each trial

rewards1.Description: possible reward for the left rocket choice

rewards2.Description: possible reward for the right rocket choice

missed_earth.Description: indicates if response window was missed for stage 1 - rocket choice

missed_planet.Description: indicates if response window was missed for stage 2 - asking alien for treasure

prev_state_earth.Description: Indicates the state the earth was in for the previous trial (specific pairings of rockets)

Levels.0: first trial so no previous state

prev_state_planet.Description: Indicates the state the planet was in for the previous trial (reward state - high or low)

Levels.0: first trial so no previous state

same_earth.Description: whether the current trial state for earth is different from previous trial's earth state

Levels.1: same as previous trial state state

same_planet.Description: whether the current trial state for planet is different from previous trial's plant state

Levels.1: same as previous trial state state
